com.tabuto.jsimlife.views
Class JSLStatusBar

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.tabuto.j2dgf.gui.J2DBottomPanel
                      com.tabuto.jsimlife.views.JSLStatusBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class JSLStatusBar
extends J2DBottomPanel
implements java.util.Observer

Simple Class extends J2DBottomPanel uses to display several game information: Actual Cell Number and Actual Game Status: PLAY or PAUSE. J2DBottomPanel auto-update its information when the observer class (JSimLife) changes its state.

Author:
tabuto83
See Also:
Observer, J2DBottomPanel, JSimLife, Serialized Form
